data:
Facsimile Images

D(is) m(anibus)
((ivy-leaf)) Cosmia ((ivy-leaf))
vix(it) ((路)) an(nis) ((路)) XX

Apparatus criticus

Text after Gualtherus, following Gualtherus' indications of hederae and interpuncts; Gualtherus 1624: VIX.M.XX; Gualtherus 1624[1625]: VIX.MV.XX; as Kaibel suggests, the MV in ligature printed by Gualtherus is presumably a rendering of a poorly legible AN, possibly in ligature.

English translation

To the Shades of the Underworld. Cosmia lived 20 years.

commentary
